products.title: Organic Moringa Powder
products.description: Premium quality moringa powder sourced from sustainable farms. Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. Perfect for smoothies and wellness drinks.

products.title: Bamboo Toothbrush Set
products.description: Eco-friendly bamboo toothbrush pack of 4. Biodegradable, BPA-free bristles, and plastic-free packaging. Make your daily routine sustainable.

products.title: Ashwagandha Stress Relief Capsules
products.description: Adaptogenic herb capsules to reduce stress and anxiety naturally. Certified organic, non-GMO, and third-party tested for purity.

products.title: Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags
products.description: Set of 6 leak-proof silicone bags for zero-waste food storage. Dishwasher safe, freezer safe, and microwave safe. Say goodbye to plastic bags!

products.title: Spirulina Protein Powder
products.description: Pure spirulina powder with 60% protein content. Complete amino acid profile, perfect for plant-based athletes and health enthusiasts.

products.title: Herbal Tea Collection Box
products.description: Curated selection of 12 organic herbal teas including chamomile, peppermint, turmeric ginger, and more. Plastic-free tea bags.

products.title: Natural Deodorant Stick
products.description: Aluminum-free deodorant made with coconut oil, shea butter, and essential oils. Effective odor protection without harsh chemicals.

products.title: Organic Matcha Green Tea Powder
products.description: Ceremonial grade matcha from Japan. Rich in L-theanine for calm energy and focus. Perfect for lattes, smoothies, and baking.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Insulated 32oz water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Plastic-free, leak-proof design with carrying loop.

products.title: Plant-Based Protein Bar Variety Pack
products.description: Box of 12 vegan protein bars with flavors like almond butter, chocolate chip, and peanut coconut. 15g protein, no artificial sweeteners.

products.title: Beeswax Food Wraps
products.description: Set of 5 reusable beeswax wraps in various sizes. Natural alternative to plastic wrap for food storage. Washable and compostable.

products.title: Turmeric Curcumin Complex
products.description: High-absorption turmeric supplement with black pepper extract. Supports joint health, reduces inflammation, and boosts immunity.

products.title: Organic Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil
products.description: Virgin coconut oil for cooking, skincare, and haircare. Unrefined, non-GMO, and packaged in glass jars. Multi-purpose wellness essential.

products.title: Meditation Cushion Set
products.description: Eco-friendly meditation cushion and mat made from organic cotton and buckwheat hulls. Supports proper posture for mindfulness practice.

products.title: Probiotic Green Smoothie Mix
products.description: Organic superfood blend with probiotics, greens, and digestive enzymes. Just add water or plant milk for a nutrient-packed smoothie.

categories.name: Herbal Teas
categories.description: Organic teas for relaxation and health

storeInfo.name: GreenVibe Botanics
storeInfo.tagline: Nourish Your Body, Nurture the Planet
storeInfo.mission: We believe in the power of plants to transform health and the planet. Every product is carefully sourced from ethical suppliers committed to sustainability.
